title: ICE when creating a slice of trait objects with DST impls

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
``` rust
trait Foo for Sized? {}
impl Foo for str {}

fn main() {
    let _: &[&Foo] = &["hi"];
}
```

